data.text: Did those who found themselves upset/offended by his joke also find themselves upset by the movie Life is Beautiful?
With Larry's joke, he simply put his comical self into a dark situation, so I see nothing wrong.
Like how sterile and base do you really want comedy to be? As long as no victim is being attacked or something wrong is promoted, it's fine
I'm not someone who goes out of their way to get upset at "people being offended" but with some things, I can't help but see overreaction
